name: MY Ceremonial Event
description: MYCE is the abbreviation for MY Ceremonial Event, which means that it celebrates individual lives satisfactorily. With cloud-based Bloom services that seek event information solution services, you can provide physical services and pay at discounted rates using MYCE Token. Buyers and sellers participating in the sharing economy market can purchase and sell their goods and services in one platform (e.g., stone feasts, reunions, family holidays, birthday parties, etc.), and build a business ecosystem that connects more buyers with large event events offered by companies such as event organizers.
